万通帮助制药公司更新其 USP 方法https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Metrohm-helps-pharma-to-bring-their-USP-methods-up-to-date.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Metrohm-helps-pharma-to-bring-their-USP-methods-up-to-date.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5244c353-f9f8-4670-8c10-fa2a6f790ede Mon, 15 Jan 2024 08:41:00 -0500 Metrohm helps pharma to bring their USP methods up to date
开创性的基因组进展：采访 Illumina 的软件和信息学专家 Rami Mehio在本次采访中，Illumina 软件和信息学主管 Rami Mehio 分享了他对英国生物银行全基因组测序等重大基因组项目的经验和贡献。他讨论了基因组数据分析中的挑战和创新，强调了 Illumina 在推进基因研究和精准医学方面的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Pioneering-Genomic-Progress-An-Interview-with-Rami-Mehio-Illuminas-Software-and-Informatics-Expert.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Pioneering-Genomic-Progress-An-Interview-with-Rami-Mehio-Illuminas-Software-and-Informatics-Expert.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5d3e24c-b9a6-4fcf-9227-451b4c1cf4e9 Mon, 15 Jan 2024 08:40:00 -0500 Pioneering Genomic Progress: An Interview with Rami Mehio, Illumina's Software and Informatics Expert
研究发现，病毒载量较高的艾滋病毒人群的病毒重组率也较高研究人员调查了宿主内艾滋病毒人群的密度是否较高，同时感染和重组的发生率是否较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Study-finds-that-HIV-populations-in-people-with-higher-viral-loads-also-have-higher-rates-of-viral-重组.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Study-finds-that-HIV-populations-in-people-with-higher-viral-loads-also-have-higher-rates-of-viral-重组.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=985846fe-e1f7-4e3e-a0ee-77c5504ba3f6 Mon, 15 Jan 2024 08:11:00 -0500 Study finds that HIV populations in people with higher viral loads also have higher rates of viral recombination
古代基因组揭示了欧洲多发性硬化症风险的起源研究人员调查了导致多发性硬化症患病率地理异质性的变量以及遗传和环境因素对该疾病发展的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Ancient-genomes-reveal-origins-of-multiple-sclerosis-risk-in-Europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Ancient-genomes-reveal-origins-of-multiple-sclerosis-risk-in-Europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0e027a3-3255-44c7-af94-f84e60f61d6a Mon, 15 Jan 2024 07:50:00 -0500 Ancient genomes reveal origins of multiple sclerosis risk in Europe
在神经影像学中使用机器学习的最大规模研究为重度抑郁症诊断设立了新基准使用机器学习 (ML) 对重度抑郁症 (MDD) 进行基准分类。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Largest-study-using-machine-learning-in-neuroimaging-sets-new-benchmark-for-major-depression-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Largest-study-using-machine-learning-in-neuroimaging-sets-new-benchmark-for-major-depression-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0aabd58f-63dc-47f5-a6d9-f88a06fd9a32 Mon, 15 Jan 2024 07:49:00 -0500 Largest study using machine learning in neuroimaging sets new benchmark for major depression diagnosis
